entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
